daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A massive blaze engulfed an apartment building in Manhattan, while Brooklyn faced car terror incidents; Bronx tenants reported heat and gas outages, and NYC airports experienced delays amid FAA flight cuts. Additionally, Mayor-elect Mamdani's fare-free bus plan was rejected, and a Veterans Day parade is set for Tuesday.
